name: Space Toys
description:
Admit it: you still like picking up that toy space ship, flying around, dodging, shooting stuff with the laser; you just feel a bit too old for it. Now you can do it with no shame. Grab the ship; shoot the mines; see how long you'll last!

SpaceToys is an open-source VR game built in Godot 3.2 for oculus quest. It offers a 3rd person arcade shoot-em-up experience inspired by Valve's Xortex 26XX minigame from the Lab. It has an alternative "RC mode" which is the VR equivalent of a twin-stick shooter.

https://github.com/ssj71/SpaceToys
